item.description:
Mark your calendars and call your friends to make plans for a great night in Newburyport! Enjoy merchant hospitality (drinks & goodies), live entertainment, fabulous shopping and dining - and of course the spirit of the holidays - in beautiful and festive downtown Newburyport and The Tannery!

Please note that this is not a traditional meetup event.  I just wanted to post this event as something to do on a Friday night to get you into the holiday spirit, and encourage you to shop at small businesses for your holiday gifts.  The best idea is to meet up with folks who are going to attend.  Please use the comments section below to make arrangements.

I will be helping my friend Karen at her shop, The Cuckoo's Nest, 13 Pleasant St.  She sells all things sports, so if you're a fan of Boston and New England teams -- or know someone who is -- this is a must-stop shop for gifts.  Please stop in at least to say hello.

I hope to see you then!

P.S. Anyone who has been to Newburyport knows that there are a number of parking options, but street spots fill up fast, and you will pay a small fee (.50/hr) in the lots, which also get crowded.  I encourage folks to carpool or take the MBTA train. For more information about transportation and parking, visit
http://newburyportchamber.org/pages/GettingHere38;Around/.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me, Tammy, serving up egg nog and ringing up sales! Be sure to stop in and say hello.
item.name: Newburyport Chamber of Commerce Holiday Invitation Night
